DOC.brief_summary: The objective of this study is to confirm and document that with the use of a FDA Class I exempt near infrared device, VeinViewerÂ® Vision that is hands-free and can be used for healthy adult volunteers with varying skin types to assist in the improved visualization, it is possible to film, analyze and document PIV localized complications and venous flow and refill.
DOC.criteria: Must be 18 years of age or older Must be considered in good health by investigator Must be able to read and understand English Exclusion Criteria Less than 18 years of age Known allergy to Heparin History of HIT (Heparininduced thrombocytopenia) Unable to read and understand English
